short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to manage your browser cookies!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View and Edit cookies related to the current tab right from the popup interface.

This extension offers an interface to view and edit all the cookies that are related to the current page.

It is also possible to edit cookie properties right from the interface.
